name: Information Overload (psychedelia, Armstrongjojomax, mavlac)
description:
This is a game about information overload.

Roleplay your way through as a person trying to navigate the stream of different qualities of information from different sources. 

Choose carefully, what you would like to hear, because no one will ever have enough energy to get to know everything they want.

This game uses recordings of real people speaking on online platforms, check out the ideas behind their work at your own pace in this YouTube playlist:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqsG9bK8RHAdXKp77A2cdmi0KjviN1O5T

+ a paper by Vannevar Bush from 1945, read by creators

https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/1945/07/as-we-may-think/303881/

made by team "nadymkunezbylcas": 
Armstrongjojomax - art design, pritel na telefonu

mavlac - programming, super glue wizard

psychedelia - game design, sound design
